description: It's World War II and the forces of Goodness and Right are in a pickle. Hitler is on the rise and the little Fuhrer's deviousness knows no bounds. There is no scheme too outlandish, no plan too far-fetched. No, he means to rule the world and if stealing international landmarks will help him do it, then that's what he's going to do. Radio controlled dinosaurs? Of course! Solid gold weaponry? Sterling!
synopsis: It's World War II and there's nothing Hitler won't do to take over the world! Dinosaur men! Love potions! Giant robots! And all that stands in his way are the intrepid forces of the DANGER 5!
title: Danger 5
